channel.title: Excellent Work
channel.description:
WHONIX+QUBES my very first foray into linux. Following the respective installation guides and it was a breeze!
To the dev team, thank you for all your hard work it is greatly appreciated.

item.title: Excellent Work
item.dc:creator: jappleseed
item.description:
Yes, I think it has something to do with how Qubes does not isolate the root from the user account.

Read full topic

item.title: Excellent Work
item.dc:creator: bullabdomen
item.description:
i’m also installing Qubes on top my computer,hope to succeed in the installation process!

Just a quick question,during the installation process i’m having the configuration wich shown that my root user is locked,is it a good thing?

Thanks and keep up the good work!

Read full topic

item.title: Excellent Work

[quote=“jappleseed, post:1, topic:1032”]WHONIX+QUBES my very first foray into linux. Following the respective installation guides and it was a breeze!

To the dev team, thank you for all your hard work it is greatly appreciated.[/quote]

Really glad to hear this, especially for first time Linux user. Thank you.

More improvements will be coming in the future.
